column1: No products in the selected range.
column2: No products in the selected range.

column1: Can be used only with catalog input type Text field, Dropdown, Multiple Select and Price.
column2: Can be used only with catalog input type Text field, Dropdown, Multiple Select and Price.

column1: Ex: Brand facet will be displayed only if 90% of the product have a brand.
column2: Ex: Brand facet will be displayed only if 90% of the product have a brand.

column1: Max number of values returned by a facet query.
column2: Max number of values returned by a facet query.

column1: Sort products without value when sorting ASC
column2: Sort products without value when sorting ASC

column1: How the products which are missing values for this attribute should be treated when using it to sort.
column2: How the products which are missing values for this attribute should be treated when using it to sort.

column1: Sort products without value when sorting DESC
column2: Sort products without value when sorting DESC

column1: A pattern like %s UNIT where %s is the value. Eg : $%s => $20 or %s € => 20 €
column2: A pattern like %s UNIT where %s is the value. Eg : $%s => $20 or %s € => 20 €

column1: The number of digits to use for precision when displaying.
column2: The number of digits to use for precision when displaying.

column1: No exact results found for: '%1'. The displayed items are the closest matches.
column2: No exact results found for: '%1'. The displayed items are the closest matches.

column1: %1 is the only product matching your '%2' search.
column2: %1 is the only product matching your '%2' search.

column1: Clear all products positions and blacklist status ?
column2: Clear all products positions and blacklist status ?

column1: Maximum number of products to display in autocomplete results.
column2: Maximum number of products to display in autocomplete results.

column1: Maximum number of product attributes to display in autocomplete results.
column2: Maximum number of product attributes to display in autocomplete results.

column1: Maximum number of categories to display in autocomplete results.
column2: Maximum number of categories to display in autocomplete results.

column1: Redirect to product page if only one result
column2: Redirect to product page if only one result

column1: If there is only one product matching a given search query, the user will be redirect to this product page.
column2: If there is only one product matching a given search query, the user will be redirect to this product page.

column1: Use URL Rewrites for Category Filter in category navigation
column2: Use URL Rewrites for Category Filter in category navigation

column1: When set to yes, users are redirected (and all filters are reset) to the chosen category page when they use the category filter in layered navigation.
column2: When set to yes, users are redirected (and all filters are reset) to the chosen category page when they use the category filter in layered navigation.

column1: Number of facets to display expanded by default.
column2: Number of facets to display expanded by default.

column1: Use Category Name in product search
column2: Use Category Name in product search

column1: No search result for the current search.
column2: No search result for the current search.

column1: Clear all products positions and blacklist status ? All products will be reset to be visible and in 'Automatic Sort'.
column2: Clear all products positions and blacklist status ? All products will be reset to be visible and in 'Automatic Sort'.

column1: When several values are selected in a facet/filter, the default behavior is to combine them with a logical OR ("red" OR "blue"). But a logical AND can be handy for some attributes ("egg free" AND "gluten free""
column3: When several values are selected in a facet/filter, the default behavior is to combine them with a logical OR ("red" OR "blue). But a logical AND can be handy for some attributes (""egg free"" AND ""gluten free""

column1: The search weight of category names when used in fulltext search.
column2: The search weight of category names when used in fulltext search.

column1: Elasticsuite mapping has been updated real-time. However, your modifications might not be visible until the Catalogsearch Fulltext index is completely rebuilt.
column2: Elasticsuite mapping has been updated real-time. However, your modifications might not be visible until the Catalogsearch Fulltext index is completely rebuilt.

column1: Elasticsuite mapping could not be updated real-time. Please wait for the complete reindexing of Catalogsearch Fulltext index.
column2: Elasticsuite mapping could not be updated real-time. Please wait for the complete reindexing of Catalogsearch Fulltext index.

column1: Catalogsearch fulltext index has been invalidated.
column2: Catalogsearch fulltext index has been invalidated.

column1: If enabled, when necessary to support the presence of outlier values in the navigation context (for instance, a very high price amidst a majority of low prices), the price slider behavior changes so that the middle of the slider range corresponds to the median price instead of the price at the middle of the range.
column2: If enabled, when necessary to support the presence of outlier values in the navigation context (for instance, a very high price amidst a majority of low prices), the price slider behavior changes so that the middle of the slider range corresponds to the median price instead of the price at the middle of the range.

column1: If set to Yes, zero (integer or numeric attribute) or false (boolean attribute) values will be indexed in the search engine (default is No). Also applies to source model keys/values of Dropdown/Multiple Select attributes.
column2: If set to Yes, zero (integer or numeric attribute) or false (boolean attribute) values will be indexed in the search engine (default is No). Also applies to source model keys/values of Dropdown/Multiple Select attributes.

column1: If the category can be displayed in autocomplete results.
column2: If the category can be displayed in autocomplete results.
